attributes.action: Set safe havens for babies when mothers are in need or in trouble
attributes.background: Being a mother is very challenging in itself so when new mothers have no where to go or no one to turn too and are scared and all over the place or even in trouble, knowing that their are safe places or even someone to call so they are safe

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about looking after babies when their mother has difficulties but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to fund a scheme of safe havens to help mothers in specific circumstances if that is something you would like to see happen.
